QAPair.Question: What is (are) Splenic infarction ?
QAPair.Answer: Splenic infarction is the death of tissue (necrosis) in the spleen due to a blockage in blood flow.

QAPair.Question: What causes Splenic infarction ?
QAPair.Answer: Common causes of splenic infarction include: Blood clots from the heart, Blood cancer, such as lymphoma or leukemia , Diseases in which the blood clots more easily, such as sickle cell disease , Inflammation of the pancreas or a mass in the pancreas pressing on the blood vessels to the spleen,
